pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Pedestal-Basic-Use)Pedestal Aesthetics/$ $(li)To color a pedestal, right click any pedestal with a Colored Pallet right after you've just placed it down.(Once Colored it will Keep its color when broken).$(br) $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Colored-Pedestals#making-colored-pedestals)Making Colored Pedestals/$ $(li)To start you'll need a normal Pedestal, or if you already have a Colored Pedestal, that will work as well.

$(li)Then, Place the pedestal down somewhere. $(li)Make yourself some Color Pallets. (You can re-use Colored Pallets too)$(li2)First throw up to 3 of each color on the ground.$(li2)Next throw however many Pallets you want to make colored onto the ground.$(li2)Lastly r-click the ground nearby with the Linking Tool to make Colored Pallets.

$(li)Lastly, use Colored Pallets on Pedestals by using right click.(Once Colored it will Keep its color when broken) $(li)To make a Pedestal Light Up, R-Click on it with a block of Glowstone.(You'll get the glowstone back when you break the pedestal)$(li)To Waterlog a Pedestal in water, Place it in water, Or Place a water bucket in the same block space as the pedestal.(This is really useful for farms as it is a water source block to keep your field moist)
